headline: Michael Bremans, chairman, Ecover
text: Observer Ethical awards 2012 judge Michael Bremans    Michael is the managing director of Ecover, a manufacturer of biodegradable cleaning products made from renewable resources. Michael was born in Schoten, Belgium. He studied for a licenciate in applied economics at RUCA, Antwerp and his professional career has spanned the tourism and the service industry.  In 1993, Michael was appointed as managing director of Ecover Belgium and he has constantly improved the ecological influence of the Ecover factory on the environment. As a champion of environmentally friendly working practices and sustainable production, Michael is delighted to be associated with the Observer Ethical Awards. "We are looking forward to seeing which innovative, inspirational and likeminded people are nominated. Our hope is that through our day-to-day work and support of the awards we encourage many more people to follow a more ethical way of living."
